svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Maternal mortality vs. health expenditure over time, 1990 to 2015
Health financing is reported as the annual per capita health expenditure and is adjusted for inflation and price level
differences between countries (measured in 2010 international dollars).
Source: Health Expenditure and Financing - OECDstat (2017), Gapminder (2010) and World Bank (2015)
